body_html:
Just a quick update: as of 1.9 at least, it seems like this is still happening with model_to_estimator. Here's a graph of memory usage on an EC2 instance during a train_and_evaluate run using a Keras model that was turned into an Estimator.

Is there any progress on this?
body_text:
Just a quick update: as of 1.9 at least, it seems like this is still happening with model_to_estimator. Here's a graph of memory usage on an EC2 instance during a train_and_evaluate run using a Keras model that was turned into an Estimator.

Is there any progress on this?
body:
Just a quick update: as of 1.9 at least, it seems like this is still happening with `model_to_estimator`. Here's a graph of memory usage on an EC2 instance during a `train_and_evaluate` run using a Keras model that was turned into an Estimator.

![keras_memleak_tf19](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1694612/44674768-87343b00-a9fc-11e8-9f49-a3776b59793b.png)

Is there any progress on this?
